    public abstract class BasePlexusArchiverTest
extends TestSupport
    Base abstract class that all the test-cases for different archivers extend so that they can use its helpful methods.

      • waitUntilNewTimestamp

        protected void waitUntilNewTimestamp​(File outputFile,
                                     long timestampReference)
                              throws IOException
        Ensure that the last modified timestamp of a file will be greater than the one specified as a reference.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the file
        timestampReference - the file will have a newer timestamp than this reference timestamp.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the timestamp could not be modified
